title: LibGDX 1.9.10 Setup and Kotlin does not work
body:
#### Issue details
I have downloaded the latest GDX-Setup jar and created a project with "Advanced Settings" "Use Kotlin" ticked.
The build fails with the error described in the section "Stacktrace".

What I did to fix it but I am not sure if this is 100% correct:
- Increased kotlin version in project's build gradle to "1.3.41" but I think "1.3.10" should be sufficient
```gradle
buildscript {
    ext.kotlinVersion = '1.3.41'

    repositories {
        mavenLocal()
```

After that I still got two warnings:
- API 'variant.getJavaCompile()' is obsolete and has been replaced with 'variant.getJavaCompileProvider()'. No idea what that is and I could not fix it
- Configuration 'compile' is obsolete and has been replaced with 'implementation' and 'api'. Again, in the project's build.gradle file all kotlin stuff is included as dependency via 'compile'. I replaced it with 'api' to get rid of the warning.
```diff
project(":desktop") {
    apply plugin: "kotlin"


    dependencies {
        implementation project(":core")
        api "com.badlogicgames.gdx:gdx-backend-lwjgl:$gdxVersion"
        api "com.badlogicgames.gdx:gdx-platform:$gdxVersion:natives-desktop"
-        compile "org.jetbrains.kotlin:kotlin-stdlib:$kotlinVersion"
+        api "org.jetbrains.kotlin:kotlin-stdlib:$kotlinVersion"
    }
}

project(":android") {
    apply plugin: "android"
    apply plugin: "kotlin-android"

    configurations { natives }

    dependencies {
        implementation project(":core")
        api "com.badlogicgames.gdx:gdx-backend-android:$gdxVersion"
        natives "com.badlogicgames.gdx:gdx-platform:$gdxVersion:natives-armeabi"
        natives "com.badlogicgames.gdx:gdx-platform:$gdxVersion:natives-armeabi-v7a"
        natives "com.badlogicgames.gdx:gdx-platform:$gdxVersion:natives-arm64-v8a"
        natives "com.badlogicgames.gdx:gdx-platform:$gdxVersion:natives-x86"
        natives "com.badlogicgames.gdx:gdx-platform:$gdxVersion:natives-x86_64"
-        compile "org.jetbrains.kotlin:kotlin-stdlib:$kotlinVersion"
+        api "org.jetbrains.kotlin:kotlin-stdlib:$kotlinVersion"
    }
}

project(":core") {
    apply plugin: "kotlin"


    dependencies {
        api "com.badlogicgames.gdx:gdx:$gdxVersion"
-        compile "org.jetbrains.kotlin:kotlin-stdlib:$kotlinVersion"
+        api "org.jetbrains.kotlin:kotlin-stdlib:$kotlinVersion"
    }
}
```


#### Reproduction steps/code
Create a new LibGDX 1.9.10  project with Advanced Setting "Use Kotlin"

#### Version of LibGDX and/or relevant dependencies
1.9.10
Kotlin

#### Stacktrace
```gradle
FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

* What went wrong:
The Android Gradle plugin supports only Kotlin Gradle plugin version 1.3.10 and higher.
The following dependencies do not satisfy the required version:
root project 'test' -> org.jetbrains.kotlin:kotlin-gradle-plugin:1.2.71
```

#### Please select the affected platforms
- [X] Android
- [ ] iOS (robovm)
- [ ] iOS (MOE)
- [ ] HTML/GWT
- [X] Windows
- [ ] Linux
- [ ] MacOS
